term_trace.message: Hello! Please provide the requirement statements, and I'll assist with checking the extracted Concepts and Instances.

term_trace.Requirement: The AUV system is developed as a Module named "AUV_Module".
term_trace.Concept_description: A distinct and independent unit within the AUV system.
term_trace.Instance_description: The specific module of the AUV system.

term_trace.Requirement: "AUV_Module" should contain a Robotic Platform named "AUV_Platform", it should use the Interfaces "Sensors" and "Actuators" (defined by "AUV_Module").
term_trace.Concept_description: A base structure within the module that supports various robotic functions.
term_trace.Instance_description: The specific robotic platform contained within the AUV module.

term_trace.Requirement: "AUV_Module" should contain a Robotic Platform named "AUV_Platform", it should use the Interfaces "Sensors" and "Actuators" (defined by "AUV_Module").

term_trace.Instance_description: Interfaces used by the AUV module to interact with the environment.

term_trace.Concept_description: A point of interaction between the AUV module and its components.
term_trace.Instance_description: Interfaces used by the AUV module to perform actions.

term_trace.Requirement: "AUV_Module" should contain a Controller named "AUV_Operator", it should use the Interface "Inputs" (defined by "AUV_Module").
term_trace.Concept_description: A unit responsible for managing and directing the operations of the AUV module.
term_trace.Instance_description: The specific controller within the AUV module.

term_trace.Instance_description: Interface used by the AUV module to receive inputs.

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" should define a Primitive Type named "nat" (for natural numbers).
term_trace.Concept_description: A basic data type that is built into the AUV module and serves as a fundamental building block.
term_trace.Instance_description: A primitive type representing natural numbers.

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" should define a Primitive Type named "int" (for integers).
term_trace.Concept_description: A basic data type that is built into the AUV module and serves as a fundamental building block.
term_trace.Instance_description: A primitive type representing integers.

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" should define a Primitive Type named "string" (for string values).
term_trace.Concept_description: A basic data type that is built into the AUV module and serves as a fundamental building block.
term_trace.Instance_description: A primitive type representing string values.

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" should define a Primitive Type named "boolean" (for boolean values).
term_trace.Concept_description: A basic data type that is built into the AUV module and serves as a fundamental building block.
term_trace.Instance_description: A primitive type representing boolean values.

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" should define a Primitive Type named "real" (for real numbers).
term_trace.Concept_description: A basic data type that is built into the AUV module and serves as a fundamental building block.
term_trace.Instance_description: A primitive type representing real numbers.

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" should define a Composite Type named "SVec" (Spherical Vector), to record values such as "radial" (of type "real"), "polar" (of type "real"), and "azimuth" (of type "real").
term_trace.Concept_description: A complex data type that combines multiple primitive types to form a structured data unit.
term_trace.Instance_description: A composite type representing a spherical vector with components radial, polar, and azimuth.

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" should define a Composite Type named "Obstacle", to record the following values: "ns_rel_dist" (of type "real"), "ew_rel_dist" (of type real), "depth" (of type "real"), "id" (of type "real"), "obs_hdng" (of type "SVec").

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" should define an Interface named "Sensors", which contains the following Values: "depth" (of type "real"), "hdng" (of type "SVec") and "obs" (of type "Obstacle").

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" should define an Interface named "Intpus", which defines the following Events: "endTask" (with no Parameters and no Return Value), "reqOCM" (with no Parameters and no Return Value), "reqMOM" (with no Parameters and no Return Value), "reqHCM" (with no Parameters and no Return Value), "reqVel" (with no Parameters, but with a Return Value of type "real"), and "reqHdng" (with no Parameters, but with a Return Value of type "real").

term_trace.Requirement: The "AUV_Module" shall define a Function named "odist", which takes an "Obstacle" as input, that returns the distance from the AUV to the Obstacle (as "real").
term_trace.Concept_description: A block of organized, reusable code that performs a single action or calculation.
term_trace.Instance_description: A function that calculates the distance from the AUV to a given obstacle.
